com.cmput301w18t26.taskit

Class TaskItServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cmput301w18t26.taskit.TaskItServer

  • public class TaskItServer
extends java.lang.Object
    Handles server I/O for the application - push/pull {bids, tasks, users}
    See Also:
    TaskItFile, TaskItData, TaskItSync

    • Nested Class Summary

      static class  TaskItServer.addUserJob
      ---- Add {user, task, bid} methods ---- These create async tasks and will add a collection of the corresponding object to the server.
      static class  TaskItServer.deleteBidJob 
      static class  TaskItServer.deletePhotoJob 
      static class  TaskItServer.deleteTaskJob 
      static class  TaskItServer.deleteUserJob

      static class  TaskItServer.getPhotoJob 
      static class  TaskItServer.getTaskJob 
      static class  TaskItServer.getUserJob
      ---- Get {user, task, bid} methods ---- These create async tasks and will retrieve their corresponding objects from the server, returning them in their corresponding model class.
      static class  TaskItServer.setupServerJob
      Setup the server.
      static class  TaskItServer.teardownServerJob
      Delete the index for this application from the elastic search server.

                              TaskList t,
                              BidList b,
                              PhotoList p)

        Parameters:
        u - UserList to add user objects retrieved from the server
        t - TaskList to add task objects retrieved from the server
        b - BidList to add bid objects retrieved from the server*
